steps.name: LicenseManagerVirtualMachineConfig
steps.label: Network License Manager virtual machine settings

subLabel.preValidation: Configure virtual machine resources and settings

steps.bladeTitle: Network License Manager virtual machine settings

elements.name: vmSize
elements.label: Virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: Choose the virtual machine size to provision. The default size is suitable for running MATLAB. Larger sizes can increase costs.

elements.name: userPassword
elements.toolTip: Admin password for user 'manager'. This is used to login to the Network License Manager for MATLAB dashboard.

constraints.validationMessage: Choose the admin password for the user "manager". This password is required when logging into any instance using remote desktop protocol. For the deployment to succeed, your password must meet the Azure password requirements. For information on the password requirements, see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/windows/faq#what-are-the-password-requirements-when-creating-a-vm

elements.name: clientIPAddresses
elements.label: IP addresses
elements.toolTip: Client CIDR defining the range of IP addresses permitted to connect to the virtual machine. For example: 192.168.100.14/24

constraints.validationMessage: Address must use valid CIDR notation. For example: 192.168.100.14/24

options.text: Click here for more information about the Network License Manager on mathworks.com.

subLabel.preValidation: Configure virtual network resources and settings

toolTip.virtualNetwork: Name of the Virtual Network resource to use. By default a new resource is created and added to the resource group.
toolTip.subnets: A subnet is a range of IP addresses in your virtual network, which can be used to isolate virtual machines from each other or from the Internet.
